title: Ubud Monkey Forest Adventure (Half-day)
overview: A fun and educational half-day trip to the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary in Ubud.

stops.description: Explore the sanctuary, observe macaques, and visit ancient temples.
Enjoy a snack or drink at a nearby café.

title: Ubud Nature & Culture (Full-day)
overview: A full day in Ubud, visiting the Monkey Forest, temples, art markets, and scenic walks.

stops.description: Visit the sanctuary and observe monkeys.
See the main temple inside the forest.
Shop for local crafts and souvenirs.
Take a scenic walk along the ridge.
